title: Composite Mater& Process
description: Basic principles of selecting component materials and manufacturing composites are presented.  Polymeric, metallic, and ceramic systems are considered. Crosslisted with AE, CEE, CHE, and ME 4793.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 1310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1211K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
